Unitron/Shockwave:





Shockwave listened to Megatron's words, part of his attention focused 
on the nearby units under Megatron's command, and the unconsciouss 
Unitron.  

"Incorrect.  If you could not defeat Unitron, there would be no 
possibility of you being Megatron, greatest Decepticon warrior in 
history."

"It would be a grievous error to fully trust you as if you were 
Megatron but perhaps in time you can prove yourself.  For now we seem 
to have the same goals and should organize our forces to complete 
these goals."
